description:
Team Rocket was running a Pokémon evolution shop and saw Yoshichi and his Magby walk by. They explained that if he left his Magby at a Pokémon evolution shop with them, when he returned it would be an evolved Magmar.
Suspicious of the shop, Ash and his friends returned there to find that the owners had left and the shop was gone. Yoshichi was able to track down the thieves who ended up being Team Rocket. Ash and Dawn battled Team Rocket and were able to recover Magby`s Poké ball.
name: Buby (Yooshichi)
